content:
KeyAndSecretDetails Class

Definition

BEK is bitlocker key. KEK is encryption key for BEK If the VM was encrypted then we will store follwing details :

  1. Secret(BEK) - Url + Backup Data + vaultId.
  2. Key(KEK) - Url + Backup Data + vaultId. BEK and KEK can potentiallty have different vault ids.

In this Article

public class KeyAndSecretDetails
Inheritance
Object
KeyAndSecretDetails

Constructors

KeyAndSecretDetails()

Initializes a new instance of the KeyAndSecretDetails class.
KeyAndSecretDetails(KEKDetails, BEKDetails)

Initializes a new instance of the KeyAndSecretDetails class.

Properties

BekDetails

Gets or sets BEK is bitlocker encrpytion key.
KekDetails

Gets or sets KEK is encryption key for BEK.
